language.name: English
item.mythictinkers.mythical_tinkering.to:
Mysterious book chronicling hidden powerful tinkering methods
by ???
death.attack.mythictinkers.styx.player: %1$s was taken by the styx whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_scarle: %1$s tried to swim in molten scarlet neodymium
%1$s tried to swim in molten scarlet neodymium to escape %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_azure_: %1$s tried to swim in molten azure neodymium
%1$s tried to swim in molten azure neodymium to escape %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_byzant: %1$s tried to swim in molten byzantium neodymium
%1$s tried to swim in molten byzantium neodymium to escape %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_tectel: %1$s tried to swim in molten tectellus
%1$s tried to swim in molten tectellus to escape %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_elemen: %1$s tried to swim in molten element 122
%1$s tried to swim in molten element 122 to escape %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_aurich: %1$s tried to swim in molten aurichalcum
%1$s tried to swim in molten aurichalcum to escape %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_desolu: %1$s tried to swim in molten desolum
%1$s tried to swim in molten desolum to escape %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_prospr: %1$s tried to swim in molten prosprum
%1$s tried to swim in molten prosprum to escape %2$s
death.attack.mythictinkers.molten_gumbro: %1$s tried to swim in molten gumbronze
%1$s tried to swim in molten gumbronze to escape %2$s
material.mythictinkers.scarlet_neodymium: Magnetic items and mobs are pulled towards you
material.mythictinkers.azure_neodymium.e: Magnetic items and mobs are pushed away from you
material.mythictinkers.desolum.flavor: Whatever cursed this metal now curses your tools, too
material.mythictinkers.desolum.encyclope: Attacks curse your target with a desolate dagger, which does damage after a short time
material.mythictinkers.desolum.armor: Grants an 8% per level when surrounded by darkness. The darker it is, the more protection you have
material.mythictinkers.shadow_silk.encyc: Normal arrows are transformed into dark arrows, which deal less damage but bypass invincibility frames.
material.mythictinkers.byzantium_neodymi: Open tunnels through reality. No scientific theory can explain how this works.
Sneak + right click to bind to a container. Harvested items are teleported to that container.
Sneak + right click to bind to a container. Picked up items are teleported to that container.
material.mythictinkers.tectellus.flavor: From the core of the world, you can move mountains with the swing of your hand
material.mythictinkers.tectellus.encyclo: Makes stone block break at the same speed as dirt
material.mythictinkers.tectellus.ranged: Fully charged projectiles break stone blocks
material.mythictinkers.tectellus.armor: Player attacks using tools that mine stone deal more damage, but all other player attacks deal less
material.mythictinkers.element_122.flavo: The heaviest element. Created via a powerful nuclear reaction. Just barely on the island of stability.
material.mythictinkers.element_122.encyc: Tool has great stats, but decays and makes you irradiated
material.mythictinkers.aurichalcum.flavo: Said to be used in the legendary city of Atlantis. Lets you bless your tool with 2 more mythical materials.
material.mythictinkers.aurichalcum.encyc: Grants 2 Boon slots which can be used to add more materials crafted with Styx to your tool.
material.mythictinkers.prosprum.flavor: Cursed metal has been blessed by a wrathful god now freed. Strike your foes down with its might!
material.mythictinkers.prosprum.encyclop: Attack the air to deal damage to nearby foes that you recently hit
material.mythictinkers.prosprum.ranged: Missing your shot will deal damage to nearby foes that were recently hit by your arrows
material.mythictinkers.prosprum.armor: Getting hit inflicts your attacker with the Marked for Death effect
material.mythictinkers.gumbronze.flavor: A hardened alloy of metal and rare gum of the earth. Its durability if off the charts!
material.mythictinkers.gumbronze.encyclo: The less hungry you are, the less likely your tool is to take durability damage. While you have 8 ore more full hunger points, your tool takes no damage
modifier.mythictinkers.attractive.descri: Tool attracts magnetic items and mobs
modifier.mythictinkers.repulsive.descrip: Tool repels magnetic items and mobs
modifier.mythictinkers.tesseracted.descr: Tool teleports harvested items to a bound container.
modifier.mythictinkers.tesseracted.add: Bound to container at x=%d, y=%d, z=%d, facing %s
modifier.mythictinkers.tectonic_shield.d: You are shieled by Dino Spirits when using your tool
modifier.mythictinkers.aeroforming.descr: Fully charged projectiles can break stone blocks.
modifier.mythictinkers.terraformidable.d: Players using pickaxes and hammers deal more damage, but all other player damage is reduced
modifier.mythictinkers.polymer_plated.de: Protects you from radiation. Protection increases per armor piece.
modifier.mythictinkers.radioactive.descr: Tool irradiates both you and other mobs when it loses durability.
modifier.mythictinkers.glamorous.descrip: Lets you add two more Styx materials to your tool.
modifier.mythictinkers.desolate.descript: Attacks curse your enemy with a desolate dagger.
modifier.mythictinkers.dark_arrows.descr: Tool transforms normal arrows into dark arrows, which bypass invincibility frames.
modifier.mythictinkers.dreadshot.descrip: Your arrows rain down on your target from above
modifier.mythictinkers.darkness_protecti: Take less damage in darker areas
modifier.mythictinkers.vengeful_strike.d: Weapon damages recently hit enemies when swung
modifier.mythictinkers.vengeful_shot.des: Missed shots damage nearby foes recently hit by your arrows
modifier.mythictinkers.retribution.descr: Getting attacked opens your attacker to damage by your prosprum weapons
modifier.mythictinkers.gumbreakable.desc: Tool has a chance to not use durability based on how full you are
modifier.mythictinkers.byzantium_neodymi: Your tool has the traits of Byzantium Neodymium
modifier.mythictinkers.tectellus_boon.de: Your tool has the traits of Tectellus
Your tool has the traits of Element 122
Your tool has the traits of Aurichalcum
modifier.mythictinkers.prosprum_boon.des: Your tool has the traits of Prosprum
modifier.mythictinkers.gumbronze_boon.de: Your tool has the traits of Gumbronze
advancements.mythictinkers.root.title: Mythical Tinkering
advancements.mythictinkers.root.descript: Craft Mythical Tinkering, the guidebook to making mythical tools
advancements.mythictinkers.find_styx.des: Mine Styx and pick it up in a bucket
advancements.mythictinkers.mine_dombston: Mix Styx with any other liquid to create Dombstone and mine it
advancements.mythictinkers.mine_byzantiu: Find and mine Byzantium Neodymium in the Magnetic Caves
advancements.mythictinkers.byzantium_neo: Craft a tool out of Byzantium Neodymium
advancements.mythictinkers.mine_tectellu: Mine Tectellus Ore while the Luxtructosaurus boss is active in the Primordial Caves
advancements.mythictinkers.tectellus_too: Craft a tool out of Tectellus
advancements.mythictinkers.mine_element_: Use a nuclear blast or a Tremorzilla beam to mine Element 122 ore in the Toxic Caves
advancements.mythictinkers.element_122_t: Make a tool out of Element 122
advancements.mythictinkers.find_atlantea: Find Atlantean Ruins in the Abyssal Chasm
advancements.mythictinkers.aurichalcum_t: Smelt Atlantean Blocks to make a tool out of Aurichalcum
advancements.mythictinkers.mine_pure_lig: Find and mine Pure Light in the Forlorn Hallows
advancements.mythictinkers.purify_desolu: Purify a Desolum Ingot with Pure Light to craft a Prosprum Ingot
advancements.mythictinkers.prosprum_tool: Make a tool out of Prosprum
advancements.mythictinkers.mine_earthen_: Use a shovel to mine Earthen Gum in the Candy Cavity
advancements.mythictinkers.gumbronze_too: Alloy Earthen Gum and Amethyst Bronze to make a tool out of Gumbronze
